ygData.subject: Re: Clothing
ygData.msgSnippet: you can have Netted armor (wear all of it too) found in Gukk, and try the bearskin armor...like cape (+5 AC) (adds +15 to cold resistance) also get the
ygData.messageBody:
you can have Netted armor (wear all of it too) found in Gukk, and try the
bearskin armor...like cape (+5 AC) (adds +15 to cold resistance) also get
the bearskin boots (+5 AC).

Nice stuff...around 2 plat for boots and 5 for the cape.

- Ziff
